citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00pm on 29-SEP-
21. The registrant's wife stated that neither the registrant nor his vehicle or any records were available at the time of the
inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00pm on 29-SEP-
21. The registrant's wife stated that neither the registrant nor his vehicle or any records were available at the time of the 
inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
